Package nu.nerd.entitymeta

This package contains classes that implement a strongly typed, persistent metadata API for Bukkit Entities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EntityMeta
    The plugin class, which provides access to the API with EntityMeta.api().
    EntityMetaAPI
    This is the public API for accessing type-safe, persistent entity metadata.
    MetadataEntry
    Stores the Object value corresponding to a tag together with its serialised representation as a String in order to facilitate efficient removal of the tag from an Entity.
    MetadataType
    Handles the serialisation and deserialisation of metadata values of a specific Java class.
    MetadataTypeManager
    Manages the mapping from classes and type codes to MetadataType instances.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EntityMetadataException
    An unchecked exception thrown for any kind of error arising in the use of the entity Metadata API.

Package nu.nerd.entitymeta Description

This package contains classes that implement a strongly typed, persistent metadata API for Bukkit Entities.

See class EntityMetaAPI for usage examples, caveats and an explanation of the implementation.
